text: - By [Priyanka Munshi](/authors/priyanka-munshi) - Published: Fri, 29 Mar 2024 01:30 PM (IST) - Source:JND Easter Sunday 2024 Wishes For Family And Friends: Easter Sunday is a very significant day for Christians all over the world because it marks the anniversary of Jesus Christ's bodily resurrection, which represents his victory over sin and death. Easter Sunday is observed on the third day following Good Friday and represents hope, rebirth, and redemption. It confirms the core beliefs of Christianity for believers and signifies the end of Holy Week. As a sign of God's love and his promise of eternal life, Jesus' resurrection is seen as the foundation of Christianity. Beyond its religious significance, Easter Sunday is a time to celebrate with friends and family, having meals together, going to church, and engaging in customs like feasting and egg hunts. It is a cheerful and significant celebration for Christians worldwide, serving as a reminder of the strength of faith, the victory of good over evil, and the promise of fresh starts. Wishing you all the love and happiness that only Easter can bring.
